Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to an injured customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to an injured customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
